scripts.run-suite: bash -c 'SUITE_DIR="cypress/reports/${SUITE}-$(date +%d%m%Y_%H%M%S)" && mkdir -p $SUITE_DIR && npx cypress run --spec "cypress/e2e/${SUITE}.cy.js" --browser ${BROWSER} --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=$SUITE_DIR,overwrite=true,html=true,json=true'
scripts.run-all: bash -c 'ALL_DIR="cypress/reports/allTests-$(date +%d%m%Y_%H%M%S)" && mkdir -p $ALL_DIR && npx cypress run --browser ${BROWSER} --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=$ALL_DIR,overwrite=true,html=true,json=true'
